name: Escape From The Cursed House
description:
Theme:

You are trapped inside a house that has been cursed by the game developer. And all the people living in the house have become zombies. Luckily, you have an Assault Rifle. Now, you have kill all of 'em and find your way out the cursed house.

Controls: 

  • WASD + Mouse (Movement)
  • Left Mouse (Fire)

This is my first ever game jam. Game is currently unfinished, couldn't complete 😢

I'll complete this game and upload it to itch, so please follow me 😊
